testimonials.name: M E
testimonials.title: Definitely recommend her!
testimonials.description:
We heard good reviews about Stella from our friend and decided to meet her to discuss about our plans for our new home.

We found Stella friendly and easy to talk to, and she did not impose her ideas nor hard/upsell features that we did not need, this which we encountered with another ID we approached. She was able to gel with us, patiently answered our questions and offered us her opinions whenever we faced dilemmas about some parts of the 3D design.

Stella’s pricing was reasonable as well and another plus point about her is that she is very responsive. We have heard many horror stories about how IDs tend to ghost their clients or how their responses are so delayed that they only reply a few days later. This was never the case with Stella, which we really appreciate.

We started renovation in mid-May and it was mostly completed within 2 months. Stella also offered good after-sales service by following up with us promptly for the very minor defects in the house.

Overall, we would definitely recommend her to new homeowners who are looking for a reliable and trustworthy ID!

name: Dr Sky Tan Keang Leng
title: Sky Creation
badges: Verified Interior Design Firm (Yearly Audit) III
longDesc: Established in 2008 in Singapore, Sky Creation Asia specializes in interior design, renovation, small-scale construction, and furniture production. It is the first interior design firm in Southeast Asia to open a design-themed café and a design academy to train future designers. Sky Creation Asia is also the first in Singapore to practice sustainable interior design, receiving the Singapore Quality Class (SQC) accreditation, as well as ISO and OHSAS certifications for regulatory compliance. Additionally, Sky Creation has expanded its reach into Malaysia and China.
shortDesc: Established since 2008 in Singapore, the company focuses on interior design services, gradually branching into complementary businesses such as renovation, small-scale construction, furniture production, modular kitchen cabinet & wardrobe systems, modular office furniture systems, as well being the first interior design firm in South East Asia to open an interior design themed cafe.

testimonials.name: Chloe Ng
testimonials.title: Definitely recommend
testimonials.description: This is a very long overdue review! My house renovation started in July/Aug 2024. I am so glad that I engaged Brandon. He has being very patient with all my questions and changes over the planning period. He gave me many design ideas to choose. He also advised on whether the wants I proposed works for my unit or not. As I am on a tight budget, he made tweaks to the design so that I would still like the design but yet making it pocket friendly. He also helped bring me along on getting fittings, curtains, home appliances, furnitures etc. As some items are bought online, he offered that I can send it to his office or he helped received it at my house. Over the course of the last few months, he will check in to ask how is everything at home. He even came over to help tighten a loose screw in my cabinet! Really appreciate all the little help when the renovation has already long ended. Will definitely recommend him and his team to whoever needs a good makeover for their place.

testimonials.name: Hitesh Vasnani
testimonials.title: Certainly recommend
testimonials.description: My wife and I met Derrick from Our Interior in June-July 2021. We met him and showed him our floor plan. We put forward our ideas and what we wanted to do with the house. Derrick was very attentive in listening and sharing his views. Derrick understood our requirements and constraints very clearly and delivered a 3D concept which was very aligned to our dream home. In the process we also met Jalen. He reassured us that our renovation will be completed on time and handed as promised, which was duly done. We were also very impressed with the promptness of their replies via whatsapp in case of any query or clarification. I would also like to commend them on their post-sales service as they took responsibility for any minor repair works needed after handover throughout their warranty period regardless of how small or big the repair work was as well as they sincerely accommodated to our schedule. Overall, it was a positive experience after hearing many negative reviews about some IDs in the market. We would certainly recommend Derrick from Our Interior if you would like your ideas to be translated into your dream home.

testimonials.name: Candy Chong
testimonials.title: Pride in their works
testimonials.description: Jalen and team from Our Interior took pride in their works, and passionately helped us in our very first renovation journey. Of course as a first time owner we’d be full of questions and ideas, Jalen would listen wholeheartedly and explain to us patiently and gives his very best to accommodate us. With me being OCD, I understand that I may not be an easy client to deal with but Jalen doesn’t take any offence and yet he still assured us that he would rectify any problems we raised. Especially with these words, he would say them very steadily, “Ok, I will settle this.” & after that, you give him some time that he needs, fret not he will make sure he solve all the problems! Thank you again Our Interior for taking so much pride in your work!!

testimonials.name: Kara Sun
testimonials.title: Swift and smooth
testimonials.description: Was introduced by my property agent when i purchased the resales flat. Jie Neng which is the designer & Project Manager was very helpful and informative. The communication was swift and smooth. Jie Neng helped us with keeping our budget and as well as getting the designs that we wanted. When requested upon changes, he understands our wants and worries and does not hesitate to make change. The workmanship was great, i ordered most of the furnitures from taobao and engaged Jie Neng and his team to help me with the installation. Tho there could be difference in the way of installation from Singapore and the chinese way, such as showerheads, the team installed everything without any faults. Our timeline was very tight, in fact we requested the project to be completed by one month because we were kind of in a rush, the team pushed through the targetted timeline. Overall satisfied with the project, would recommend to friends and family!

testimonials.title: Highly recommend!
testimonials.description: We recently had the pleasure of working with Elpis for the renovation of our second home, and we couldn’t be more pleased with the experience. They were incredibly helpful, always reliable, and quick to respond to any questions or concerns we had. Their professionalism and attention to detail made the renovation seamless and stress-free. testimonials.name: Jeraid Kng
testimonials.title: Recommend them!
testimonials.description:
We decided to go with ELPIS as they were recommended by a family member who appointed them. Zhiqi and Frederick worked well as a pair - Zhiqi liaised with the vendors while Frederick took care of the onsite matters and it was clear that they are experienced renovators as they could handle all the matters. They understood our requirements well, as the renders came out very close to our moodboard that we shared with them.
They are honest, responsive and responsible so we could trust them for their recommended vendors and also to keep a close watch on the timeline. We are happy with the quality of the renovation and would recommend them to anyone looking for a trustworthy ID.

testimonials.name: Jasmine Ong
testimonials.title: Highly recommend!
testimonials.description: I hired J’Abode Interiors to renovate my kitchen together with the Home Improvement Program (HIP), and I couldn't be more thrilled with the results. Jay also suggested painting the entire house to complement the new kitchen, which was an excellent recommendation. From the outset, communication was seamless; Jay took the time to understand my ideas and offered creative, innovative solutions. The project was completed on time, and the team demonstrated professionalism and great respect for my home every step of the way. The craftsmanship is outstanding, with every detail thoughtfully planned and executed. They handled unexpected challenges with remarkable ease. Additionally, Jay proposed a rework of the living room and bedroom layouts, and the final design is both functional and visually stunning. I highly recommend J’Abode Interiors to anyone looking to transform their space!

testimonials.name: Saw Leng
testimonials.title: Won’t be disappointed!
testimonials.description:
I worked with Jay Koh on my condo renovation and couldn’t be happier. Despite strict feng shui requirements, he designed a layout that was both stylish and functional, making the most of every space.

What stood out was his dedication—he went beyond his scope, ensuring everything was executed perfectly. From planning to handover, he was fully committed, even providing great aftercare service.

If you need a reliable and hardworking interior designer who truly cares, I highly recommend Jay Koh. You won’t be disappointed!

name: Serene Lim
title: Classic Furniture
badges: Verified Interior Design Firm (Yearly Audit) I
Consumers Choice ID Firm (Yearly Audit) I
longDesc:
Established in 1980, we specialize in high-quality carpentry, backed by our local Singapore factory for precision craftsmanship. Since 2010, we’ve expanded into full house renovations, blending expert woodworking with complete interior transformations.


Trusted by countless homeowners, our repeat clients and referrals reflect our commitment to reliability and excellence. As a preferred renovation specialist, we take pride in delivering tailored solutions that exceed expectations—combining decades of skill with a passion for creating exceptional living spaces.
shortDesc: Established in 1980, we specialize in high-quality carpentry, backed by our local Singapore factory for precision craftsmanship.

The designers took the time to understand my style and needs, delivering a modern yet timeless look that perfectly suits my home. The carpentry work is flawless—every built-in cabinet, wardrobe, and feature piece is premium quality, sturdy, and beautifully finished.

testimonials.name: Hongkai Tan
testimonials.title: Exceptional efforts
testimonials.description:
We engaged Daniel and Team from Verse Concept to convert our existing study room into our daughter's room. Given our fixed timeline, Daniel's team collaborated with us to establish a clear and detailed project plan. The team proactively prepared for the project, including pre-construction carpentry measurements, to ensure continuous progress throughout the renovation.
Daniel and his team demonstrated responsiveness in all communications and provided excellent post-handover support. Our carpentry team's exceptional efforts are also noteworthy. However, the performance of the assigned painting team could have been better.

testimonials.title: Great experience!
testimonials.description:
I had a great experience working with Novo Studio for my house renovation! From the start, the ID was professional, friendly, and easy to communicate with, which made the whole process smooth and stress-free. They really took the time to understand my needs and preferences, offering great ideas and practical solutions along the way.


The final design turned out beautifully—exactly what I had envisioned. Every detail was thoughtfully planned, and the overall aesthetic feels modern, functional, and cozy. The workmanship was solid, and I appreciate the effort they put into ensuring everything was done properly.


On top of that, the pricing was very reasonable for the quality of work and service provided. No hidden costs or surprises—just a straightforward and pleasant experience. I’m really happy with how everything came together and would definitely recommend Novo Studio to anyone looking for a reliable and talented ID firm!

testimonials.name: woof_less
testimonials.title: Best for our dream home!
testimonials.description: We decided to go with 7sBuild to be our house builder while sourcing for other builders. Although their quote wasn’t the cheapest, they went through with me all the material and current market costs, and through a few meet-ups, we understood that their project director, Stanny, has the experience of 20 over years for landed residential property in SG. That convinced us he would do his best for our dream home. Rebuilding isn’t cheap, and we struggled quite a bit while negotiating with him before signing the deal. He took the initiative to update us on the progress of our house and also rectified some concerns we highlighted. The results were better than what we had envisioned, and he didn’t fail our expectations.

testimonials.name: Eng Ruoh Wei
testimonials.title: Beyond grateful for their creative genius!
testimonials.description:
We bought our semi-detached in July 2024 and collected the key end of September 2024. The house was rundown, with broken window, kitchen cabinets and water-leak, which need a lot of reworks. Our target is to move into the new house by Christmas. It was a very challenging task. Our heartfelt thanks to our interior design company – PROJECT GURU who completed the project within the timeline (less than 3 MONTHS time) and exceeds all expectations. 


We're beyond grateful for their creative genius and unwavering dedication to bringing our vision to life. Their impeccable taste and attention to detail have transformed our space into a haven of comfort and style. Thank you for making our house feel like home. The work was delivered on time, and the quality is way beyond what we had ever expected. Everyone who visits my place now, can’t stop admiring this new decoration. PROJECT GURU had turned our house into such a beautiful home. We love being at home, now. We highly recommend the PROJECT GURU for delivering the quality work on time. The team is very responsive, supportive and helpful. I think we had made the right decision hiring them.

testimonials.name: Yimin Chin
testimonials.title: Very pleased with the final look
testimonials.description:
This was our second experience with ProjectGuru, and they truly exceeded our expectations. This time involved a major overhaul, and we felt somewhat uncertain about how to make the space efficient, especially with two young children. Lon showcased his expertise in space planning, clearly explaining how the proposed layout would meet our needs. He quickly incorporated our ideas into the visual renderings, making it easy to visualize the changes.

Throughout the renovation, Lon effectively coordinated daily tasks and schedules, which really put us at ease. He was always responsive to our numerous questions and welcomed our feedback with professionalism. His focus on problem-solving was especially appreciated. Overall, we are very pleased with the final look and feel and would highly recommend Lon and his team to anyone starting their renovation journey!

testimonials.name: Junie Tio
testimonials.title: Outstanding work!
testimonials.description:
Tony, I wanted to take a moment to express our heartfelt appreciation for the outstanding work you have done in designing, coordinating, and closely following up on our house renovation.

Your collaborative efforts and unwavering commitment to excellence have truly left a lasting impression on us. The synergy between your design ideas and meticulous coordination throughout the project were instrumental in creating a space that far exceeded our expectations.

Your attention to detail, creativity, and dedication to ensuring every aspect of the renovation was executed without major hiccup. It's clear that your passion for interior design goes beyond just a profession; it's a true commitment. The way you seamlessly integrated our preferences with your expertise resulted in a home that not only reflects our style but also feels like a personalized sanctuary.

Thank you for your exceptional commitment, hard work, and the genuine care you put into making our house a home. Your collaboration has made this renovation journey not only successful but also an immensely enjoyable experience.

Side Note: Now being 10 months after the handover - Tony still promptly get the necessary touch-up or minor repair done after each feedback. KUDOS!!!!

testimonials.name: Larren Chen
testimonials.title: Very very good experience
testimonials.description:
Took up their renovation back in Nov 2021 as their Interior Designer Yunyang was very thoughtful with a very practical and awesome design. Though our price was lock down in Nov 2021, Projectguru kept to their promise. He helped me and my wife as well as our parents with space planning and especially for my Road Bike & Foldable bike storage which were incorporated with a display cabinet. Yunyang follow up fast & closely on the 3D, Detailed drawings & the whole renovation process which was completed in 1 mth 3 weeks instead of 2 mths originally stated. Yunyang and his project team manager Lon follow up closely and update promptly on every aspect of the renovation from tiling to carpentry to plumbing, aircon, electrical works and etc. Follow up by them on some matters were also addressed fast and response were fast as well. Parquet floorings, build in cabinets for all rooms, full kitchen cabinets, window grills, tiling, partition wall for study room, MBR build in vanity and many more were done up very nicely. We were all very satisfied with the final outcome. Nice, cozy and very very relax feeling. Thank you again to Projectguru especially Yunyang and also Lon for giving us a very very good experience of our renovation. Looking forward to meeting you both at my new house. Definitely need a wefie with you both.

I strongly recommend Yunyang and Projectguru to anyone who wanna do a good renovation.

testimonials.name: Carol Cheong
testimonials.title: Definitely the right person to go to
testimonials.description:
I took up the ID package after comparing with 2 other firms though Lucas was recommended by my property agent. I need to thank him sincerely for doing such a good job in my unit. He has 3 prominent strengths - 1. dedication - always prompt to reply to my queries regardless of the timing. though I didn't expect him to reply me and had thought I just drop him my question. He even offered to assemble a queen storage bed which I bought online and I didn't realise no installation service was given! 2. stakeholder engagement- very good at managing expectations and keeping me informed at important stages, also flagging out concerns promptly so that discussions and decisions can be made. 3. eye for detail - sharing his experiences to help in decision making whether be it color, furnishing, anything else. Highly recommended!!!

If you want someone to handle your renov with strong sense of ownership and provide a lot of helpful advice with no compromise and no excuses, Lucas is definitely the right person to go to.

They were also highly responsive, detail-oriented, and followed up consistently without being pushy. I still remember them showing up with mood boards and a ton of printouts for our second meeting. Very impressive.
Also, I have seen the quotation, and for the quality of service and design insights provided, their pricing felt very fair and reasonable.

testimonials.name: Alaghis Devi
testimonials.title: Skilled and reliable!
testimonials.description:
I recently had my home renovated by Mr Brain.  He is truly a professional who takes pride in his work. One of the things I appreciate most is his approachability, whenever I had a concern or didn’t like something, he immediately resolved it and even provided creative ideas to improve the project.


Another great aspect of his service is that he also provides 3D pictures, which helped me visualize the renovation before the actual work began. This made it so much easier to plan and make decisions with confidence.


What truly sets him apart is his dedication—every morning, he personally visits the site to supervise the work, ensuring that everything is on track and up to standard. His attention to detail and hands-on approach gave me peace of mind throughout the entire project. Furthermore he finished all the work on time. We really appreciate his work and the professionalism.


I got to know him through my daughters, as he had worked with them before, and they highly recommended him. Now, after seeing his excellent work firsthand, I can confidently say they were right. He is a skilled and reliable contractor who goes the extra mile, I highly recommend. My future projects also I will definitely approach him.

9 Creation Pte Ltd is a well-established interior design firm in Singapore with over 10 years of experience. We transform living and working environments with a distinctive approach. Our experienced team specialises in personalised spaces for HDB, condominiums, landed properties, and commercial projects. testimonials.name: E Tan
testimonials.title: We are very satisfied!
testimonials.description:
We are very satisfied Logan’s work. During our search for an ID, Logan was one of the first IDs that returned our call and showed enthusiasm in helping us design our dream home. Before engaging Logan, we consulted a few other IDs, but they were not able to properly gauge the style that we were looking for and did not seem as genuine. After the first meeting with Logan, he came up with a few sample drawings and we were impressed by his art work and professionalism. Without a doubt, we went ahead and booked Logan’s time.

Throughout the whole renovation process, Logan gave many creative ideas and genuine advices. He was always responsive when we had questions, and always attended to us very quickly. When the renovation was completed, the work was beyond our expectations, it was very refined and neatly done. We have received many compliments from our friends and family.

If we had to go through the process again, we will pick Logan as our ID, definitely. These photos cannot fully express the beauty of Logan’s work as we’re not the greatest photographers. Thanks Logan for all your hard work and commitment, we will highly recommend you to all our friends and family.

testimonials.name: Shari Dipu
testimonials.title: Responsiveness and dedication!
testimonials.description:
My husband and I had an incredible experience working with Kelvin Ser from 9 Creations. He is very professional, knowledgeable, responsive & prompt in following up.

As first-time owners, we were clueless about the design & maintenance of the house, he gave us suggestions & advice and worked within our budget. He also provided us with prompt updates on the renovation progress. What truly sets Kelvin apart is his responsiveness and dedication to ensure that works are done properly and he attended to us even during odd hours at night. He had even helped us liaise with some of our deliveries even though we did not buy them through him. Even after we moved in, he still provide good after sales services, there were some areas that needed touch ups, he promptly arranged for his contractors to come.

His ongoing support made us feel confident in our choices and truly transformed our home! Finding a very good ID that doesn’t give us a headache was our biggest priority after hearing horror stories from our family & friends about their IDs and Kelvin proved that our choice was right!

We went through a very tough phase personally and my family will not forget support Kelvin gave us during that tough period.

If anyone needs a trustworthy ID & a peace of mind, you can look for Mr Kelvin Ser. Will definitely recommend him to our family and friends.

testimonials.name: Tze C Lim
testimonials.title: Trusted for their professionalism!
testimonials.description:
Benny and Weiting designed and oversaw the renovation of our 17 year old 5rm flat. After scouring different ID websites such as Quanvast and Bestinsingapore.com, and out of the shorted listed ID firms, 9 Creation responded with the most reasonable quotation. They are able to offer better quality materials on top of the complimentary design service with 2D and 3D renderings.

Both me and my husband are away overseas and unable to be present physically for materials selection and site inspection. Benny and Weiting were able to effectively communicate with us with video calls and Whatsapp messages to help us through the whole design process and materials selection. I especially commend Weiting 's patience in accommodating to our numerous changes and requests.

We are very happy with final result as the workmanship is excellent and the various stages were executed according to schedule. We were updated frequently with photos of works done at every stage which reassured us that things are going well.
Benny and Weiting have continued to respond to our queries or send workers down to rectify the problems even after the conclusion of the renovation. I think 9 Creation can be trusted for their professionalism and integrity as your choice of Renovation firm!
testimonials.mobileDescription:
Benny and Weiting designed and oversaw the renovation of our 17 year old 5rm flat. After scouring different ID websites such as Quanvast and Bestinsingapore.com, and out of the shorted listed ID firms, 9 Creation responded with the most reasonable quotation. They are able to offer better quality materials on top of the complimentary design service with 2D and 3D renderings.

Both me and my husband are away overseas and unable to be present physically for materials selection and site inspection. Benny and Weiting were able to effectively communicate with us with video calls and Whatsapp messages to help us through the whole design process and materials selection. I especially commend Weiting 's patience in accommodating to our numerous changes and requests.

We are very happy with final result as the workmanship is excellent and the various stages were executed according to schedule. We were updated frequently with photos of works done at every stage which reassured us that things are going well.
Benny and Weiting have continued to respond to our queries or send workers down to rectify the problems even after the conclusion of the renovation. I think 9 Creation can be trusted for their professionalism and integrity as your choice of Renovation firm!

name: Carmen
title: Wolf Woof
badges: Verified Interior Design Firm (Yearly Audit) I
Consumers Choice ID Firm (Yearly Audit) I
longDesc: Wolf Woof is a design studio dedicated to creating unique, bespoke homes that reflect the individuality of their owners. Led by founder Carmen, with a background in marketing and graphic design, the firm takes an unconventional, out-of-the-box approach to interior design. Wolf Woof excels in creativity, versatility, and delivering the "wow factor," ensuring each design captures the homeowner's essence. The studio isn't tied to any specific style, executing everything from Scandinavian to quirky and minimalist designs, with the philosophy of "Your Home, Your Rules" guiding their work to create truly one-of-a-kind spaces.
shortDesc:
Wolf Woof is a multifaceted design studio that believes that every home should be as unique as its owners. We believe in creating bespoke homes that infuse unique, personal touches while ensuring functionality and liveability. We believe in creating stories that reflect the homeowners’ taste and preferences. We believe in taking an unconventional approach to designing dream homes and rising above mediocrity because no one deserves a cookie-cutter home.

Wolf Woof’s winning formula? Our ability to craft one-of-its-kind bespoke homes that are not only good-looking but jam packed with unique features and at the same time ooze character and charm. Because of founder Carmen’s strong marketing and graphic design background, the firm’s approach to interior design is the so-far-out-of-the-box-you-cannot-even-see-the-box approach. 

Wolf Woof’s competitive edge? Creativity (to bring homeowners to places where they would otherwise not have gone on the reno journey, to not think like a typical Interior Designer). Versatility (to execute different styles with equal ease). Wow factor (not all wow factors involve over-the-top features but must capture the essence of homeowners and yes, evoke that ‘PIK POK PIK POK’ feel – if a design doesn’t make your heart skip a beat, it has not done its job)

Wolf Woof’s design philosophy? BE ANYTHING BUT MEDIOCRE. In general, mediocrity and herd mentality puts us off. Wolf Woof’s other design philosophy is – YOUR HOME, YOUR RULES… because no one can/should dictate how your home should look. You decide how your home should reflect who you are, it’s the designer’s job to ensure that the eventual idea is unique, exciting and befitting.  

Wolf Woof is not married to any particular design style. We believe STRONGLY that good designers should be able to execute ANY DESIGN STYLE, from the commonly-requested Scandinavian style, to Hamptons chic, to Regal and Debonair, to Minimalist, to fun and quirky etc. Because it’s not hard to be good at doing just ONE thing (style) day in and out, it takes a lot more to be able to interpret a plethora of very diverse styles.
ogDescription: Wolf Woof creates bespoke homes that reflect individuality, ensuring functionality and liveability with unique designs.

featuredVideos.videoDesc: Welcome to "Interior Designer Showcase", this is a special series where we shine a spotlight on some of the most talented, industrious and visionary interior designers in Singapore. In this series, we'll be taking a closer look at their work, inspirations, and creative processes, as well as exploring the ethos that drives their design philosophy. From going behind the scenes to looking at their beautiful showrooms,  we bring a rare glimpse of how these designers turn spaces into works of art. Join us as we delve into the world of interior design and discover the stories behind these exceptional designers and the stunning spaces they create. In this episode, we feature Part 2 of M2 Decor!

Welcome to the first episode of our "Designer Showcase", this is an special series where we shine a spotlight on some of the most talented, industrious and visionary interior designers in Singapore. In this series, we'll be taking a closer look at their work, inspirations, and creative processes, as well as exploring the ethos that drives their design philosophy. From going behind the scenes to looking at their beautiful showrooms,  we bring a rare glimpse of how these designers turn spaces into works of art. Join us as we delve into the world of interior design and discover the stories behind these exceptional designers and the stunning spaces they create.

Join us as we delve into the world of interior design and discover the stories behind these exceptional designers and the stunning spaces they create. In this episode, we feature Part 2 of M2 Decor!

Welcome to the 3rd episode of our  "Project Diary," the show where we take you behind the scenes of some of the most stunning celeb homes in Singapore. Today, we are truly excited to take you on a home reveal tour of the beautiful home of celebrity host, Quan Yifong and her daughter, Eleanor Lee! Their home reveals a glimpse of their quiet and simple life. Inspired by modern country design style with an eclectic mix of furniture and displays. You'll be surprised at how this project gets transformed by the designer, Benjamin Toh (M2 Decor). So sit back, relax, and get ready to be inspired as we explore this power couple's stunning space.  This is "Project Diary: Quan Yifong and Eleanor''s Modern Country Home Reveal."

It's the 4th episode of our SIXiDES' "Project Diary" and Part 2 of Quan Yi Fong and Eleanor Lee's home! We take you behind the scenes of some of the most stunning celeb homes in Singapore, at the same time, we learn about what are the components and barang barang that the celebs got to make their home! Their home reveals a glimpse of their quiet and simple life. Inspired by modern country design style with an eclectic mix of furniture and displays. You'll be surprised at how this project gets transformed by the designer, Benjamin Toh (M2 Decor). So sit back, relax, and get ready to be inspired as we explore this celeb's cosy apartment. This is "Project Diary: Quan Yifong and Eleanor''s Modern Country Home Reveal."

badges: Verified Interior Design Firm (Yearly Audit) I
longDesc: We are The Local Project Pte Ltd, a collective of creative interior designers. Established in 2020, we design solutions to a variety of lifestyle challenges that our clients face. At the core of our service is the high standard we hold - both for the design of your home, and the finished product. It is our belief, as interior designers, to create good rapport with our clients and to provide the best advice and services. We strive to be the top design and build company in Singapore that creates uniquely designed residential and commercial spaces.
shortDesc: We are The Local Project Pte Ltd, an Interior Design/Renovation firm, established in Singapore in 2020...

testimonials.name: John Smith
testimonials.title: Incredibly awesome!
testimonials.description: We have engaged Kelvin Ong from The Local Project for our 4-room makeover. Kelvin did a good job in drafting out the initial design in accordance to our demands. name: Jackie Lai

address: 60 Paya Lebar Rd, #07-54 Paya Lebar Square, Singapore 409051
longDesc: Founded in Singapore in 2007, JIA Studios is an award-winning interior design consultancy known for blending functionality and aesthetics. We deliver high-end interior and architectural designs for a diverse range of clients across Singapore, Malaysia, Dubai, Australia, Cambodia, Korea, and China. Our projects include private residences, hotels, spas, resorts, F&B and spa wellness projects. Notable works include the Formula One Corporate Suites of Singapore GP and the award-winning Spa Natureland. We create spaces that integrate form and function, envisioning complete user experiences.

name: Kevin
title: DIVA's Interior Design
badges: Verified Interior Design Firm (Yearly Audit) I
Consumers Choice ID Firm (Yearly Audit) I
longDesc: Diva’s Interior Design started out as a small company of just 5 interior designers with a passion and vision to make the home-building journey a little better. Fast forward a few years later, here we are, a company with more than 20 employees, all running with the same vision of building better homes. With our help, your dream home, office, or space is just one call or click away. Reach out to us and find out how Diva’s Interior Design can help you.
shortDesc: Diva’s Interior Design started out as a small company of just 5 interior designers with a passion and vision to make the home-building journey a little better.

testimonials.name: Christine Low
testimonials.title: Highly recommended!
testimonials.description:
This is my second time engaging Diva’s Interior, and once again, they’ve exceeded expectations. Daniel has been a patient, professional, and reliable ID throughout the entire renovation journey. He took the time to understand our needs and was always accommodating, especially towards my Aunt’s specific requests. 


His partner, Stephanie, was also incredibly meticulous and helpful, ensuring every detail was attended to. From planning and execution to post-renovation defect rectifications, both Daniel and Stephanie were thorough and responsive, giving us a peace of mind every step of the way. 


A big thank you to the Daniel & Stephanie  for making this a smooth and pleasant experience once again. 😆Highly recommended!
testimonials.mobileDescription:
This is my second time engaging Diva’s Interior, and once again, they’ve exceeded expectations. Daniel has been a patient, professional, and reliable ID throughout the entire renovation journey. His partner, Stephanie, was also incredibly meticulous and helpful, ensuring every detail was attended to. From planning and execution to post-renovation defect rectifications, both Daniel and Stephanie were thorough and responsive, giving us a peace of mind every step of the way. 


A big thank you to the Daniel & Stephanie  for making this a smooth and pleasant experience once again. 😆Highly recommended!

testimonials.title: Stunning and worry-free
testimonials.description: We’re so grateful to have found such an amazing designer - Andrew Yap . He always delivers beautiful, thoughtful results and takes care of every little detail. With our busy work schedule, we didn’t have time to manage the renovation ourselves — but he made the whole process so easy and stress-free. Super professional, creative, and really understands our style. Highly recommend if you want your home to turn out both stunning and worry-free ❤️

longDesc: Mono X is a Singapore-based multi-disciplinary design studio specializing in Architecture, Interior Architecture, Product Design, Landscape, Urban Design, and more. name: Roy
title: Aestherior
badges: Verified Interior Design Firm (Yearly Audit) I
longDesc: Aestherior Pte Ltd is a trusted interior design firm in Singapore, specializing in residential and commercial projects. We offer comprehensive services, including space planning, design, site coordination, and furnishing consultations. Led by a management team with over a decade of experience, our certified in-house designers have a minimum of three years' industry experience. Client satisfaction is our priority, and we ensure transparency with no hidden costs. After the initial consultation, we provide detailed floor plans, sketches, and competitive quotations for approval, delivering high-quality designs tailored to our clients' needs.

name: Benny Chiah
title: Idfferent Design
longDesc: Our company is pronounced as Different (Idfferent) and is founded in 2019 by two aspiring designers. We have strategically inverted the "I" and the "D" as "ID" represents Interior Design, which is the heart of our company. Idfferent Design hopes to provide a truly unique user experience that breaks and challenges the traditional norm in our industry. To us, your renovation journey is just the beginning of a brewing friendship that will accompany you through time, and not just a regular one-off service. Our creative team is committed to create a bespoke renovation experience by providing comprehensive design services down to a T. We have made our mission to create a beautifully crafted and refined interior that speaks and reflects your heart desires. We believe that cultivating a genuine friendship with everyone is the key to creating an environment of candour and sincerity. We will be your trusted friend that will guide you through the intricacy of renovation.

testimonials.name: Jason Seow KK
testimonials.title: Overall highly recommended!
testimonials.description:
After hearing about many renovation horror stories, we were adament to look for an ID by word of mouth. Douglas was recommended to us by 3 friends who engaged his services. He and his team did a fantastic job with the design and renovation of our home. 


After a first meeting of about 4 hours and sharing our mood board, we decided to engage him. The first 3D render exceeded our expectations, and was almost fully aligned to our ideas with minimal changes. 


He is honest with his quotations, open with concerns, always ready to listen to our ideas and share new ideas. As it is our first home, we had lots of ideas and wanted to try new gadgets. 


He managed to incorporate gadgets like robot vacuum (with auto water kit) and water dispenser seamlessly into our kitchen. He is very hands on, and would visit the site regularly. He is also responsive to post reno rectification. Overall highly recommended!

name: Natalie Chin
title: Rough Sketch
longDesc:
Roughsketch is a Singapore-based interior design studio specialising in residential spatial design. With a focus on the way people live, move, and feel within their homes, we craft thoughtful, refined interiors that balance form, function, and feeling.


To bring our concepts to life with precision and craft, we operate our own in-house carpentry workshop, allowing us to create custom-built solutions that align seamlessly with each design. From bespoke cabinetry to refined detailing, this hands-on approach ensures quality, consistency, and an elevated finish across every project.
shortDesc: Roughsketch is a Singapore-based interior design studio specialising in residential spatial design. With a focus on the way people live, move, and feel within their homes, we craft thoughtful, refined interiors that balance form, function, and feeling.

I have read too many horror stories of ID trying to earn a quick buck or recommend more expensive outfits. She knew our budget and recommended based on it. More importantly,  she was spot on with a lot of the aesthetics we wanted in our house. Definitely recommend!

testimonials.name: Jowena Cheng
testimonials.title: Professionalism and commitment!!
testimonials.description:
My husband and I engaged with Daz Lee for our home renovation and had a very positive experience working with him. He was always responsive, patient, and had a great attitude throughout the whole process. I really appreciated how he promptly addressed issues we pointed out and made sure things were rectified.

While there were some challenges with the workmanship of the contractors (some tasks needed to be redone), Daz took responsibility and followed through to ensure things were fixed properly. Overall, we are happy with his service and dedication, and could see he genuinely cared when delivering a good outcome for the clients. Would recommend him for his professionalism and commitment!! Thank you Daz :)
